text: Harold Geoffrey Norris was an Australian Anglican priest in the mid Twentieth century.Genealogical web-site Ordained in 1937,Crockford's Clerical Directory 1967/68 p 914: Oxford, OUP, 1968 after a curacy in Timaru he held incumbencies at Mount Somers and Hinds, New Zealand before wartime service as a Chaplain to the Forces; and at Riccarton and Ashburton afterwards. He was Archdeacon of Rangiora from 1960 to 1963; and then of Timaru until his death in 1969.The Press ==References== Category:Archdeacons of Timaru
title: Harold Norris
